attributes.action: Change the rules on how much non parliamentary work MPs can do.
attributes.additional_details: Its sensible to welcome MPs into the house of Parliament with outside interests. However once in the houses of parliament MPs should have only one goal, and that is to serve their constituents and the British people to the absolute maximum they can achieve. They should not be distracted with editing newspapers, running companies, being lawyers, farmers, GPs or Trade Union officials, etc... The undersigned demand that the challenging role of an MP gets the 100% commitment that it deserves.
attributes.background: We call upon HM Government to debate and justify to the British public how they find time to have multiple employments when we need our MPs to dedicate their working time to representing their constituents. We want the Government to introduce legislation restricting additional employment for MPs.
